description: All page types (configurable, developer, etc.)

validation: if (!/^[a-zA-Z\-]+$/g.exec(name)) "Name may only contain letters or hypens."
description: A unique name for the container. Only letters or hypens are allowed. e.g., "MyNewPage", "my-new-page", etc.
Pages built with the html, css, and javascript.
The external dependencies used in the page
If true (default), minimal styles are added to the page to align with the rest of the MOLGENIS frontend.
If true (default) and base styles are enabled, then buttons used in the custom page will be styled using the MOLGENIS styles. Use "type='submit'" to use primary styles.
If true, custom pages will fit the width of the screen. (Default: false)
External dependencies used in the developer pages
A name is a label used to identify a dependency
URL to the dependency
If defined, a setting higher priority level will indicate that a dependency should be retrieved ahead of other dependency
External CSS dependencies used in custom pages
External JavaScript dependencies used in custom pages
If true, the dependency will be loaded in parallel and executed as soon as it is loaded. This setting will override any "defer" setting
If true, the dependency will be loaded after content is parsed. This setting will be ignored if async is defined

If true, content will be expanded to the fit the full width of the screen
